desc: With patented AirBrake™ casting tech, we engineered an easy casting centerpin that eliminates backlash and line twist. Sand-proof construction backed by a 5 Year Warranty. The #1 centerpin under $500 for the beginner or experienced angler. With Redband Reels, anyone can master the art of Pin fishing.

layout.text: A bait-casting centerpin to take on any species or technique.
